text: Does Meghan Markle Want 5 Kids? Prince Harry Has Some Thoughts The royal newlyweds may still be basking in their honeymoon glow, but of course people are already wondering if Prince Harry and Meghan Markle want kids. When pressed by fans, the Prince has made it clear exactly how many kids is too many, but that doesn ’ t mean babies won ’ t be part of the couple ’ s future. Prince Harry and Meghan Markle have already been forthcoming about wanting to have a family. During their first interview with the BBC after getting engaged, they were questioned about having kids and Prince Harry responded, ” I think one step at a time and hopefully we ’ ll start a family in the near future. ” ADVERTISEMENT The question is, exactly how many kids?
